title: Contributing to Yamada UI
description: We want to create a community where Yamada UI is enjoyable and educational for anyone and everyone.

title: Community
description: Yamada UIのコミュニティ

title: Team and Contributors
description: Wonderful engineers who have provided time, effort, and thought to Yamada UI.

title: Badge
description: `Badge` is a component that emphasizes the status of an item to make it immediately recognizable.

title: Calendar
description: `Calendar` is a component for displaying or selecting dates in a calendar.

title: Card
description: `Card` is a component that groups and displays related information. By default, it renders a `section` element.

title: Carousel
description: `Carousel` is a component that displays multiple elements like a slideshow.

title: Change the speed of slide transition

hierarchy.lv3: Change the speed of slide transition

hierarchy.lv3: Change the size of the slides

title: Data Display
description: Components for constructing the display of project data, such as `Table` and `Calendar`, are available.

title: Kbd
description: `Kbd` is a component that represents keyboard input.

title: List
description: `List` is a component for displaying lists. By default, it renders a `ul` element.

title: Markdown
description: `Markdown` is a component that renders text in markdown format.

title: Changing the Theme of Code Blocks

hierarchy.lv3: Changing the Theme of Code Blocks

title: NativeTable
description: `NativeTable` is a component for efficiently organizing and displaying data.

title: PagingTable
description: `PagingTable` is a table component with pagination functionality.

title: Reorder
description: `Reorder` is a component that allows you to change the order of items using drag and drop.

title: Resizable
description: We are currently considering the development of `Resizable`.

title: ScrollArea
description: `ScrollArea` is a component that displays a customized scrollbar.

title: Change the timing of the scrollbar display

hierarchy.lv3: Change the timing of the scrollbar display

title: Change the duration it takes for the scrollbar to disappear

hierarchy.lv3: Change the duration it takes for the scrollbar to disappear

title: Stat
description: We are currently considering the development of `Stat`.

title: Table
description: `Table` is a table component equipped with column sorting, row selection, and click event features.

title: Limit the Maximum Number of Multi-Sorts

hierarchy.lv3: Limit the Maximum Number of Multi-Sorts

title: Change Ascending and Descending Order Toggle

hierarchy.lv3: Change Ascending and Descending Order Toggle

title: Tag
description: `Tag` is a component used to categorize or organize items using keywords that describe them.

title: Accordion
description: `Accordion` is a component for a list that displays information in an expandable or collapsible manner.

title: Set a Specific Item to be Expanded by Default

hierarchy.lv3: Set a Specific Item to be Expanded by Default

title: Disclosure
description: Components such as `Accordion` or `Tabs` are available to save display space while showing numerous items.

title: Tabs
description: `Tabs` is a component for switching between different display areas.

title: Alert
description: `Alert` is a component that conveys information to the user.

title: AreaChart
description: We are currently considering the development of `AreaChart`.

title: BarChart
description: We are currently considering the development of `BarChart`.

title: CircleProgress
description: `CircleProgress` is a component that displays progress in a circular progress bar.

title: Feedback
description: Components such as `Alert` and `Skeleton` are available for notifying users and prompting them to wait while content is loading.

title: LineChart
description: We are currently considering the development of `LineChart`.

title: Loading
description: `Loading` is a component displayed during waiting times, such as when data is being loaded.

title: Progress
description: `Progress` is a component for visually indicating progress.

title: RadarChart
description: We are currently considering the development of `RadarChart`.

title: Skeleton
description: `Skeleton` is a component that acts as a placeholder until content is loaded.

title: Autocomplete
description: `Autocomplete` is a component used to display suggestions in response to user text input.

title: Change Insert Position of Created Items

hierarchy.lv3: Change Insert Position of Created Items

title: Do Not Close Dropdown List on Selection

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Close Dropdown List on Selection

title: Do Not Close Dropdown List on Blur

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Close Dropdown List on Blur

title: Button
description: `Button` is an interactive component that allows users to perform actions such as submitting forms and toggling modals.

title: Checkbox
description: `Checkbox` is a component used for allowing users to select multiple values from multiple options.

title: ColorPicker
description: We are currently considering the development of `ColorPicker`.

title: DatePicker
description: `DatePicker` is a component used for users to select a date.

title: Change First Day of the Week

hierarchy.lv3: Change First Day of the Week

title: Allow Input Beyond Min and Max Range

hierarchy.lv3: Allow Input Beyond Min and Max Range

title: Do Not Close Calendar on Selection

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Close Calendar on Selection

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Close Calendar on Blur

title: Disable Dates Outside the Current Month

hierarchy.lv3: Disable Dates Outside the Current Month

title: Dropzone
description: Dropzone is a component used for uploading files via drag and drop.

title: Specify Maximum Number of Uploadable Files

hierarchy.lv3: Specify Maximum Number of Uploadable Files

title: Editable
description: `Editable` is a component used to obtain inline editable text input.

title: FileButton
description: `FileButton` is a button component used for users to select files.

title: FileInput
description: `FileInput` is a component used for users to select files.

title: FormControl
description: `FormControl` is a component used to group form elements with labels, help messages, error messages, etc.

title: Replacing Help Message with Error Message

hierarchy.lv3: Replacing Help Message with Error Message

title: IconButton
description: `IconButton` is a component that displays an icon within a button.

title: Form
description: Components for building forms in the project, such as `Input` and `Select`, are available.

title: Input
description: `Input` is a component used to obtain text input from the user.

title: MonthPicker
description: `MonthPicker` is a component used for users to select a month.

title: Do Not Close Calendar on Selection

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Close Calendar on Selection

title: Do Not Close Calendar on Blur

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Close Calendar on Blur

title: MultiAutocomplete
description: `MultiAutocomplete` is a component used to display suggestions based on user text input and to obtain multiple values.

title: Change Insert Position of Created Items

hierarchy.lv3: Change Insert Position of Created Items

title: Set Maximum Number of Selectable Values

hierarchy.lv3: Set Maximum Number of Selectable Values

title: MultiSelect
description: `MultiSelect` is a component used for allowing users to select multiple values from a list of options.

title: Set Maximum Number of Selectable Values

hierarchy.lv3: Set Maximum Number of Selectable Values

title: NativeSelect
description: `NativeSelect` is a component used for allowing users to select one option from a list. It displays a native dropdown list provided by the browser (user agent).

title: NumberInput
description: `NumberInput` is a component used to obtain numeric input from the user.

title: PinInput
description: `PinInput` is a component used to capture pin codes or OTP (One-Time Password) inputs.

title: Radio
description: `Radio` is a component used for allowing users to select one option from multiple choices.

title: RangeSlider
description: `RangeSlider` is a component used for users to select a range of related values.

title: Handle Events for Start and End of Changes

hierarchy.lv3: Handle Events for Start and End of Changes

title: Rating
description: We are currently considering the development of `Rating`.

title: SegmentedControl
description: `SegmentedControl` is a component used for allowing users to select one option from multiple choices.

title: Select
description: `Select` is a component used for allowing a user to choose one option from a list.

title: Keep Dropdown List Open on Selection

hierarchy.lv3: Keep Dropdown List Open on Selection

title: Keep Dropdown List Open on Blur

hierarchy.lv3: Keep Dropdown List Open on Blur

title: Slider
description: `Slider` is a component used for allowing users to select a value from a range.

title: Handle Events for Start and End of Changes

hierarchy.lv3: Handle Events for Start and End of Changes

title: Switch
description: `Switch` is a component used to toggle between on and off states.

title: Textarea
description: `Textarea` is a component used to obtain multi-line text input.

title: Components
description: Yamada UI provides prebuilt components to help you build projects faster.

title: AspectRatio
description: `AspectRatio` is a component for embedding things like videos and maps while maintaining the aspect ratio.

title: Box
description: `Box` is the most abstract component on which all other components are built. By default, it renders a `div` element.

title: Center
description: `Center` is a component that aligns the child elements in the center within the component.

title: Container
description: `Container` is a component used as a general division element. By default, it renders the `section` element.

title: Divider
description: `Divider` is a component that represents a division between elements.

title: Flex
description: `Flex` is a component that sets `flex` to `Box`. Also, convenient style shorthand is available.

title: Grid
description: `Grid` is a component for managing grid layouts. It also comes with handy style shorthand.

title: Layout
description: Components for building the layout of the project, such as `Box` and `Stack`, are available.

title: SimpleGrid
description: We are currently considering the development of `SimpleGrid`.

title: Spacer
description: `Spacer` is a component used to add space between elements.

title: Stack
description: `Stack` is a component that groups elements and provides space between child elements.

title: Add a dividing line between child elements

hierarchy.lv3: Add a dividing line between child elements

title: Wrap
description: `Wrap` is a component that has `wrap` set on `Flex`. It inherits convenient style shorthand from `Flex`.

title: Avatar
description: `Avatar` is a component that displays a profile picture or an icon with initials representing a user.

title: Fontawesome Icon
description: `@yamada-ui/fontawesome` provides convenient components for using `Font Awesome`.

title: Icon
description: `Icon` is a general icon component that can be used in your projects.

title: Image
description: `Image` is a component that displays images with fallback support.

title: Media and Icons
description: Components such as `Icon` and `Image` are available to embed images and `svg` into your project.

title: Indicator
description: `Indicator` is a component that displays at the corner of elements such as avatars.

title: Breadcrumb
description: `Breadcrumb` is a component that helps users understand the hierarchy of a website.

title: Use an icon as a separator

hierarchy.lv3: Use an icon as a separator

title: Navigation
description: Components such as `Link` and `Breadcrumb` are available to display hyperlinks and the location of pages within the project.

title: Link
description: `Link` is a component for creating hyperlinks to different web pages, locations within the same page, or other URLs.

title: LinkBox
description: `LinkBox` is a component that allows elements such as articles or cards to function as a single link.

title: Pagination
description: `Pagination` is a component for managing the pagination and navigation of content.

title: Spotlight
description: We are currently considering the development of `Spotlight`.

title: Stepper
description: `Stepper` is a component that displays the progress of a multi-step process.

title: CloseButton
description: `CloseButton` is a component used primarily to trigger the close functionality of a component.

title: FocusLock
description: `FocusLock` is a component that improves accessibility by restricting focus within elements such as modals and dialogs, and locking the focus within that range.

title: Other
description: Other useful components such as `Ripple` and `Portal` are available.

title: Motion
description: `Motion` is a convenient component that extends the Yamada UI style system to `framer-motion`.

title: Portal
description: `Portal` is a component that renders elements outside of the current `DOM` hierarchy.

title: Changing the Destination of Nested Portals

hierarchy.lv3: Changing the Destination of Nested Portals

title: Ripple
description: `Ripple` is a component that adds a ripple effect to elements, allowing users to recognize when they have clicked.

title: Dialog
description: `Dialog` is a component used to confirm or interrupt user actions.

title: Do Not Block Scroll When Dialog Opens

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Block Scroll When Dialog Opens

title: Drawer
description: `Drawer` is a component for a panel that appears from the edge of the screen.

title: Do Not Block Scroll on Mount

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Block Scroll on Mount

title: Overlay
description: Components such as `Modal` and `Drawer` are available to temporarily block interactions with the background UI.

title: Menu
description: `Menu` is a component that displays a common dropdown menu.

title: Keeping the Menu Open When an Item is Selected

hierarchy.lv3: Keeping the Menu Open When an Item is Selected

title: Keeping the Menu Open When Focus is Lost

hierarchy.lv3: Keeping the Menu Open When Focus is Lost

title: Modal
description: `Modal` is a component that is displayed over the main content to focus the user's attention solely on the information.

title: Do Not Block Scroll When Modal Opens

hierarchy.lv3: Do Not Block Scroll When Modal Opens

title: Popover
description: `Popover` is a component that floats around an element to display information.

title: Displaying Based on a Different Element

hierarchy.lv3: Displaying Based on a Different Element

title: Tooltip
description: `Tooltip` is a component that displays short information, such as supplementary details for an element.

title: Collapse
description: `Collapse` is a component that allows you to expand or collapse an element for display.

title: Fade
description: `Fade` is a component that gradually shows or hides an element.

title: Transitions
description: Components such as `Collapse` and `Fade` are available to provide animations to elements, creating visual transitions.

title: ScaleFade
description: `ScaleFade` is a component that gradually scales up to reveal or scales down to hide an element.

title: Slide
description: `Slide` is a component that shows or hides an element from the corners of the page.

title: SlideFade
description: `SlideFade` is a component that gradually shows or hides an element while moving it from a specified position.

title: Heading
description: `Heading` is a component that represents section headings. By default, it renders an `h1` element.

title: Highlight
description: `Highlight` is a component that highlights specified strings within text. By default, it renders a `p` element.

title: Typography
description: Components such as `Heading` and `Text` are available for constructing text in your project.

title: Text
description: `Text` is a component that represents a paragraph of text. By default, it renders a `p` element.

title: Figma
description: This page is currently being created.

title: Learn the Advanced
description: Learn the applications of themes, styles, responsive, dark mode, and animations of Yamada UI.

title: Learn the Basics
description: Read a 3-minute tutorial to learn the basics of Yamada UI's themes, styles, responsiveness, dark mode, and animations.

title: Getting Started with Create React App
description: A guide to installing and using Yamada UI in your Create React App project.

hierarchy.lv1: Getting Started with Create React App
Getting Started with Create React App
Getting Started with Create React App

title: Framework
description: How to install and use Yamada UI for each framework.

title: Getting Started with Next.js
description: A guide to installing and using Yamada UI in your Next.js project.

title: Getting Started
description: How to get started with Yamada UI.

title: Installation
description: How to install and use Yamada UI in your project.

title: Hooks
description: Convenient custom hooks are provided in Yamada UI to help you build your projects more quickly.

title: useAnimation
description: `useAnimation` is a custom hook that implements animations similar to CSS `keyframes`.

title: useAsync
description: `useAsync` is a custom hook that executes an asynchronous function and tracks its state.

title: useBoolean
description: `useBoolean` is a custom hook used to manage boolean values using `on`, `off`, and `toggle` functions.

title: useBreakpointValue
description: `useBreakpointValue` is a custom hook that returns the value of the current breakpoint from the provided object. This hook monitors changes in the window size and returns the appropriate value.

title: useBreakpoint
description: `useBreakpoint` is a custom hook that returns the current breakpoint. This hook monitors changes in the window size and returns the appropriate value.

title: useClipboard
description: `useClipboard` is a custom hook that performs the operation of copying a value to the clipboard.

title: useColorModeValue
description: `useColorModeValue` is a custom hook that returns the value of the current color mode from the provided values.

title: useColorMode
description: `useColorMode` is a custom hook that returns the current color mode.

title: useDisclosure
description: `useDisclosure` is a custom hook that helps handle common open/close or toggle scenarios. It can be used to control components such as `Modal`, `Dialog`, `Drawer`, etc.

title: useDynamicAnimation
description: `useDynamicAnimation` is a custom hook used to switch animations.

title: useHover
description: `useHover` is a custom hook that detects whether the pointer has moved over or away from an element.

title: useIdle
description: `useIdle` is a custom hook that detects whether the user has been idle for a certain amount of time in milliseconds.

title: useInterval
description: `useInterval` is a custom hook that runs a function at a specified interval.

title: useLoading
description: `useLoading` is a custom hook for controlling the loading of the application.

title: useLocalStorage
description: `useLocalStorage` is a custom hook for storing, updating, and retrieving values in local storage.

title: useMediaQuery
description: `useMediaQuery` is a custom hook that detects whether it matches a single or multiple media queries.

title: useNotice
description: `useNotice` is a custom hook that controls the notifications of the application.

title: useOS
description: `useOS` is a custom hook that returns the user's OS.

title: useOutsideClick
description: `useOutsideClick` is a custom hook that detects click events outside of an element.

title: usePrevious
description: `usePrevious` is a custom hook for obtaining the previous value.

title: useResizeObserver
description: `useResizeObserver` is a custom hook that tracks changes in the size and position of an element.

title: useSnacks
description: We are currently considering the development of `useSnacks`.

title: useTheme
description: `useTheme` is a custom hook that returns a function for retrieving and switching themes.

title: useTimeout
description: `useTimeout` is a custom hook that executes a function after a specified number of milliseconds.

title: useToken
description: `useToken` is a custom hook for retrieving tokens from the theme.

title: useUpdateEffect
description: `useUpdateEffect` is a custom hook that skips side effects on the initial render, and only runs them when the dependency array changes.

title: useValue
description: `useValue` is a custom hook that combines `useBreakpointValue` and `useColorModeValue`.

title: useWindowEvent
description: `useWindowEvent` is a custom hook that assigns an event listener to `window`.

title: Animation
description: Yamada UI supports ready-to-use animations.

title: CLI
description: Generate types of customized themes using CLI commands.

title: Color Mode
description: All components of Yamada UI support dark mode.

title: Gradient
description: Yamada UI supports readily usable gradients.

title: Styled System
description: Learn about the Style props and themes of Yamada UI. Style props is a method to change the style of a component just by passing props to the component.

title: Loading
description: Yamada UI supports the loading animations needed in applications.

title: Notification
description: Yamada UI supports the necessary notifications in the application.

title: Reset Styles
description: How to customize and add reset styles.

title: Responsive Styles
description: Yamada UI supports ready-to-use responsive styles.

title: Semantic Tokens
description: Yamada UI supports semantic tokens.

title: Style Props
description: Learn about Style props in Yamada UI. Style props is a method to change the style of a component just by passing props to the component.

title: Text and Layer Styles
description: How to use text and layer styles.

title: Component Styles
description: How to create and customize styles for components.
